page.title: 06SHOPS SERVING CLUN VALLEY
page.content: Because of the nature of the area it is neccessary to travel out of the area to shop. There are several centres which serve the community. Within a ten mile radius there are Craven Arms, Clun, Knighton and Bishops Castle. Further afield Ludlow and Church Stretton have markets. Shrewsbury and Hereford are both thirty or so miles away and are patronized by the locals occasionally. Many people use private vehicles for this purpose but there are also bus services for those without cars, though these don't help those from remoter villages. For some people the answer to the shopping problem is to take advantage of shops that deliver. There are regular deliveries from the Stores at Clun and the Butcher will deliver most days.
